lines.text: Matt, I meant what I said last night.

[Being carried off by cannibals]
Oh, swell... You can shed a few tears on my gravy.

[Trapped in space capsule]
Matt, I can't breathe!
If *you* can't breathe, we're really in trouble.

[re cannibal tribe]
Matt, the space capsule. They're worshipping it.
Maybe they found out what it cost.
The only wild animal I want to see is the cigarette girl at the Stork Club.
After these few days in the jungle with you, my resistance has collapsed.
Everything else seems to be holding up.

[to Luba's father]
Hi, dad, You should get the Nobel Prize for architecture.
Mr. Merriwether. What do I tell the President?
Tell him I voted for Nixon.
